name: Authentication and authorization
description: Common patterns for securing APIs through APIM policies and backend enforcement.

patterns.name: Subscription keys + JWT
notes: Use subscription keys for consumer access control and request attribution.
Use JWT validation for user/workload identity and claims-based authorization.

patterns.name: Managed identity to backend
notes: Use managed identity where possible to reduce secret distribution.
Combine with policy-based token acquisition and backend validation.
